Component: 1a. Interior nonstructural walls and partitions: Light frame <= 9 ft in height (7-22 ONLY)
1b. Interior nonstructural walls and partitions: Light frame > 9 ft in height (7-22 ONLY)
1c. Interior nonstructural walls and partitions: Reinforced masonry
1d. Interior nonstructural walls and partitions: All other walls and partitions
2a. Cantilever elements (unbraced or braced to structural frame below its center of mass): Parapets and cantilever interior nonstructural walls
2b. Cantilever elements (unbraced or braced to structural frame below its center of mass): Chimneys where laterally braced or supported by the structural frame
3a. Cantilever elements (braced to structural frame above its center of mass): Parapets
3b. Cantilever elements (braced to structural frame above its center of mass): Chimneys
3c. Cantilever elements (braced to structural frame above its center of mass): Exterior nonstructural walls
4a. Exterior nonstructural wall elements and connections: Wall element
4b. Exterior nonstructural wall elements and connections: Body of wall panel connections
4c. Exterior nonstructural wall elements and connections: Fasteners of the connecting system
5a. Veneer: Limited-deformability elements and attachments
5b. Veneer: Low-deformability elements and attachments
6. Penthouses (except where framed by an extension of the building frame) (7-16 ONLY)
6a. Penthouses (except where framed by an extension of the building frame): Seismic force-resisting systems with R >= 6 (7-22 ONLY)
6b. Penthouses (except where framed by an extension of the building frame): Seismic force-resisting systems with 4 <= R < 6 (7-22 ONLY)
6c. Penthouses (except where framed by an extension of the building frame): Seismic force-resisting systems with R < 4 (7-22 ONLY)
6d. Penthouses (except where framed by an extension of the building frame): Other systems (7-22 ONLY)
7. Ceilings: All
8a. Cabinets: Permanent floor-supported storage cabinets more than 6 ft tall, including contents
8b. Cabinets: Permanent floor-supported library shelving, book stacks, and bookshelves more than 6 ft tall, including contents
9. Laboratory equipment
10a. Access floors: Special access floors (designed in accordance with Section 13.5.7.2)
10b. Access floors: All other
11. Appendages and ornamentations
12. Signs and billboards
13. Other rigid components (7-22 ONLY)
13a. Other rigid components - High-deformability elements and attachments (7-16 ONLY)
13b. Other rigid components - Limited-deformability elements and attachments (7-16 ONLY)
13c. Other rigid components - Low-deformability materials and attachments (7-16 ONLY)
14a. Other flexible components: High-deformability elements and attachments
14b. Other flexible components: Limited-deformability elements and attachments
14c. Other flexible components: Low-deformability materials and attachments
15. Egress stairways not part of the building seismic force-resisting system
16. Egress stairs and ramp fasteners and attachments
